mapper.select: SELECT u.address1, u.uid, u.nickname, (SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX(u.address1, ' ', 1) AS address FROM users u WHERE p.user_id = u.user_id LIMIT 1 ) AS address, p.* FROM posts p, users u WHERE p.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY p.post_id DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{size};
mapper.insert: insert into posts (category, uid,user_id, title,contents) values(#{category}, #{uid},#{user_id},#{title}, #{contents});
